ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that only the "Binding SObject" or the "Binding SObject Alternate" field is specified and not both.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISBLANK( BindingSObject__c ) ) && NOT( ISBLANK( BindingSObjectAlternate__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only specify the "Binding SObject" field or the "Binding SObject Alternate" field; not both.
